metadata.title: CVE-2017-3251 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent:Server: Optimizer). Supported versions that are affected are 5.7.16 andearlier. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows high privileged attackerwith network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server.Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized abilityto cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQLServer. CVSS v3.0 Base Score 4.9 (Availability impacts).

criterions.comment: percona-xtradb-cluster-5.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
